Aktana seeks an experienced Senior Customer Impact Analyst to work with our customers to understand their strategic goals and structure analytical frameworks to measure the success of these goals and quantify the ultimate business impact. The overall objective is to deepen our engagement with customers by identifying exactly how our customers are using our product and then using analytics to identify what is working and what isn't. The ideal candidate is somebody with both advanced technical skills as well as a developed business sense that enables them to identify customer needs and communicate analytical results in a non-technical way. Additionally
column2: the ideal candidate will have experience manipulating life sciences syndicated commercial data (such as Symphony or IQVIA) and will have worked in a sales and marketing analytics function or consulting role.

Do you enjoy complex optimization with real-world constraints? Are you interested in defining the future operating model for Amazon’s European operations?

Operations is at the heart of Amazon’s customer experience and differentiation. Our ambition is to be the earth’s most customer-centric business and set the industry standard for customer innovation and experience. The EU Amazon Customer Excellence System (ACES) Team is responsible for driving step-change improvements in the performance of Amazon’s European Operations. We work backwards from the customer and define new innovative solutions that raise the bar on customer experience and speed whilst constantly lower our cost of fulfillment and supporting our continued high growth.

This is a very exciting time to join the European Central Flow team given our fast growth and rapid change across the EU. The team works on the top strategic projects and opportunities across the European operations influencing business-critical decisions and taking the performance of the operations to the next level.

column1: A renowned international company needs a Lead Big Data Architect to join their headquarters in Barcelona.
One of the most famous IT companies in the world needs a hands-on Lead Big Data Architect to become the most important person in the Barcelona area.
The right candidate must have also been involved in Big Data projects (real-time) and have worked with Big Data technology for quite some time.
As a Lead Big Data Architect
column3: mentoring and leading your team as well as provide technical support to the rest of the teams within the organization whenever necessary plus you'll always be in direct contact with providers and clients at all times. Your responsibilities will include:

column1: Provide technical support to your team and the rest of the teams when needed
Lead the Engineering team and the data strategy
Be the person in charge of presenting offers to clients from a technical point of view
Effective problem-solving skills and a creative approach to resolving problems in uncharted territory
Working on several projects simultaneously and multi-tasking
Essential to have experience as Python
Experience or knowledge with one of the major distributions of Big Data: Cloudera
Experience working with distributed data processing in real-time  Storm or Spark Streaming
Experience designing and developing Big Data Solutions
Experience in managing and leading teams
Spanish and English full professional proficiency
Please register your interest by sending your CV to GONZALO via the Apply link on this page

Our ideal candidate will be specialized in statistics and will be focused on how to improve forecasting. Description Improve the forecasting process through the design of forecasting techniques and algorithms in order to minimize MAPE. Responsible for Defining statistical forecast strategies based on advanced algorithms: Analyses the client portfolio behavior and identifies statistical approaches for the different segments; Determines MAPE targets; Runs forecasting simulations to pick up best algorithms and optimize their parameters; Determine the Daily Sales Profiles; Generates the reporting/alerts for internal forecast review. Managing statistical forecasting tools: Prepare update of performance & baseline review tool; Develop and Maintain the forecasting simulation tools; Propose optimum statistical parameters calculated through the simulation (such as alpha

JOIN OUR GLOBAL SUPPLY CHAIN CENTER OF EXCELLENCE IN BARCELONA AS A STATISTICAL DATA SCIENTIST. You will contribute to empower the life of our patients worldwide by using statistical data to provide tangible outcome working with the latest technologies. Our ideal candidate will be specialized in statistics and will be focused on how to improve forecasting. Description Improve the forecasting process through the design of forecasting techniques and algorithms in order to minimize MAPE. Responsible for Defining statistical forecast strategies based on advanced algorithms: Analyses the client portfolio behavior and identifies statistical approaches for the different segments; Determines MAPE targets; Runs forecasting simulations to pick up best algorithms and optimize their parameters; Determine the Daily Sales Profiles; Generates the reporting/alerts for internal forecast review. Managing statistical forecasting tools: Prepare update of performance & baseline review tool; Develop and Maintain the forecasting simulation tools; Propose optimum statistical parameters calculated through the simulation (such as alpha

column3: nació en Canarias en 1987 como grupo empresarial experto en el área de los Recursos Humanos y cuenta con más de 50 delegaciones en toda España para poder estar cerca de nuestros clientes. La especialización en Recursos humanos y el profundo conocimiento de nuestros profesionales en los distintos sectores donde operamos
column4: nos permite ofrecer un amplio portafolio de soluciones eficaces
column5: innovadoras y con la mejor relación calidad-precio del mercado en el ámbito del outsourcing

column1: La cada vez más importante gestión de los recursos humanos como factor clave de éxito empresarial motiva a Grupo Constant a innovar en este campo y ofrecer servicios adaptados a cada tipología de proyecto. Los expertos en recursos humanos de nuestra empresa
column2: analizan constantemente las últimas tendencias a nivel mundial
column3: para poder aplicarlas en beneficio de nuestros clientes. Fruto de esta filosofía
column4: Grupo Constant es una empresa líder en la gestión de personas.

column1: Para formar parte de nuestro equipo
column2: precisamos incorporar un/aIT Business Data Analystcuyas funciones principales serán:

column1: Dar sentido y significado a los datos que se recogen de los proyectos de integración de Big Data del Grupo.
Analizar los resultados de las estrategias de inteligencia de negocio
column2: siendo parte fundamental en el proceso de recopilación de grandes cantidades de datos en diferentes formatos.

column1: Transformar datos en información relevante y útil para el Grupo.

column2: analizar resultados utilizando técnicas estadísticas y proporcionar informes continuos.

column1: Adquirir datos de fuentes de datos primarias o secundarias para enriquecer los datos de análisis.

column2: analizar e interpretar tendencias o patrones en conjuntos de datos complejos para encontrar conclusiones.

column1: Identificar y proponer mejoras basadas en información de datos.
Realizar auditorías de migración de datos
Liderar iniciativas basadas en datos para mejorar la toma de decisiones de la empresa y el conocimiento del negocio.
Trabajar directamente con los equipos de Operaciones
column2: Dirección de Negocio y Áreas Corporativas para apoyar sus procesos y sistemas
column3: comprender sus desafíos/requisitos empresariales y ayudar a identificar mejoras y soluciones.

column2: implementar y administrar las pilas tecnológicas utilizadas en los diferentes departamentos.

column1: Ayudar a planificar nuevas soluciones y a garantizar que las soluciones existentes satisfagan las demandas del Negocio y sus principales partes interesadas.

Developing new analysis related to business travel
You are comfortable working in English
3 or more years of experience in Business Intelligence or a similar role
Excellent organisational and problem solving/decision-making skills with keen attention to detail
Critical thinking and problem solving capabilities
Experience and demonstrated competence in database MySQL / PostgreSQL
You are familiar with the Agile methodologies (Scrum)
Basic knowledge of Machine learning and GitHub is preferred
Benefits As well as being a fun company to work at
An attractive package: health insurance & entrances to conferences
The opportunity to work with an international talented team
A table tennis on the terrace and a gaming room!
A kitchen area with free snacks
We truly think personality is important: if you are eager to learn and want to go out your comfort zone

She/He will work in the following projects side by side with our Catalan and European partners:
BOOST4.0 is an H2020 European project that aims to connect the factories of the future to an International Data Space (IDS) and guide them in the introduction of the Big Data in their sectors.

FemIOT is a ‘Tecnologies Emergents’ project seeking to produce an IoT data valoritzation platform based in Apache technologies and to deploy on this platform some use cases in the fields of the sustainable energy and mobility.

Looming Factories is another ‘Tecnologies Emergents’ project that aims to provide secure data connectors to the factories 4.0 and a data marketplace in which the data will be shared and processed safely.

Contribute to the design and implementation of the trusted IDS data Connector element of IDS

column1: HP's MJF process is a complex transformational process that is driving cutting edge approaches for the collection and analysis of data. We are looking for curious and focused interns to jump into the data lake with us and use applied innovation in analytics and machine learning to help us advance our fundamental understanding of this exciting new science.

We expect you an accomplished deep learning specialist

column2: LSTM) is a plus. Experiences with generative adversarial networks and/or reinforcement learning a plus.

column4: Spain The Team The team is responsible for building and maintaining the tool for detecting fraudulent orders made by the customers of the platform. The system evaluates every order using both a set of predefined rules and machine learning algorithms developed by the team. Evaluated orders are then made accessible to fraud agents via UI for taking final decision and allowing them to reject high-risk transactions. We take advantage of a very heterogeneous environment we work in. Our microservices are built in Java and deployed to AWS cloud while the data processing and learning of AI models happens in GCP. Every member (not only Data Scientists) is welcome to contribute to the research part in which we employ mostly Python. We also stay up to date with latest frontend advancements and have rewritten our UI in React. The team is formed by Software Engineers and a Data Scientist
column5: knowledge sharing is one of our top priorities (hackdays
column7: etc.). We follow Kanban and lean development practices
column8: adapting them to what works best for us.
